column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A man took petrol and set himself alight on a plot of land near Road 6
column5: 2019.------According to preliminary sources from the residents living near the scene
column6: the man who committed suicide had recently returned from working in Thailand and was a drug user.------Following the incident
column7: Russey Keo district police cooperated with the police force of the Phnom Penh to investigate the scene. The death was ruled a suicide.------Graphic images in ------source link
